backend/main.mo: Defines a simple actor exposing a query method that returns an empty Nat array.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend source files describing their roles and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Gujarati language metadata and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with routes for Home, About, Services, and Contact using a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Renders the brand name in Gujarati with configurable size and styling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the site-wide layout including navigation, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ReplaceableImage: Image component supporting local image uploads with empty-state placeholders and hover-to-replace behavior.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Displays a service title paired with an optional uploadable image placeholder.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Navigation header with active-route highlighting and Gujarati labels.
frontend/src/content/gu.ts: Central Gujarati content dictionary containing strings for navigation, pages, services, and contact info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, and logout methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, custom CSS variables, fonts, and utility classes for consistent theming and styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with an image, description text, and owner information pulled from localized content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details including phone, address, hours, and a call‑to‑action button, using localized content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page hero, working hours, call button, and important notes using content-driven components.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a list of service offerings and an important note section, rendering each service with a ServiceCard component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, container settings, and animations with custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state and constraints for a Gujarati-only tailoring business website built with React and Tailwind, including design rules, image restrictions, services, and required pages. Also lists existing features, requirements, and architectural notes for continued development.
